tool_description: An API fetching news related to augmented and virtual reality all over the globe
name: AR-VR news
title: AR-VR news

api_list.name: Get news about AR and VR  from individual resource
api_list.description: Get news about AR and VR  from individual-specific resources.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ar-vr-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/bbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ar-vr-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ar-vr-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ar-vr-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
